title: Saulepi
text:
Saulepi is a village in <a href="L%C3%A4%C3%A4neranna%20Parish">Lääneranna Parish</a>, <a href="P%C3%A4rnu%20County">Pärnu County</a>, in southwestern <a href="Estonia">Estonia</a>, on the coast of the <a href="Gulf%20of%20Riga">Gulf of Riga</a>. It has only 7 inhabitants (as of 1 January 2011).
<a href="Saulepi%20Manor">Saulepi Manor</a> ("Saulep") was established in 1797 by detaching it from the nearby <a href="Vana-Varbla%20Manor">Vana-Varbla Manor</a> ("Alt-Werpel"). Simple wooden main building was constructed in the middle of the 19th century. Nowadays it is a private property.
The islets <a href="K%C3%B5rksaar">Kõrksaar</a> and Rootsiku laid also belong to Saulepi village.
